home.Title: Home
home.Paragraph1: Morpher is an inflection generation and morphological analysis framework.
home.Paragraph2: This application lets the users generate inflected word forms and morphologically analyze inflected word forms.

input.Label: Lemma
input.RequiredError: The lemma is mandatory for inflection generation.

input.Label: Inflected word form
input.RequiredError: The inflected word form is mandatory for morphological analysis.

settings.Title: Settings
settings.LanguageChangeText: You can change the language of the application here:

affixTypes.EmptyMessage: At least one affix type must be selected.

<SUBJUNC-IMP><PERS<1<OBJ<2>>>>.DisplayName: Subjunctive-Imperative, 1st person, singular, definite, 2nd person object

<COND><PERS<1<OBJ<2>>>>.DisplayName: Conditional, 1st person, singular, definite, 2nd person object

<PAST><PERS<1<OBJ<2>>>>.DisplayName: Past, 1st person, singular, definite, 2nd person object
